comments.body: Am I right that this is the right example for 1.3+ only?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@
  http://kafka.apache.org/documentation.html#quickstart
 
  and then run the example
-    `$ bin/spark-submit --driver-class-path external/kafka-assembly/target/scala-*/\
+    `$ bin/spark-submit --jars external/kafka-assembly/target/scala-*/\

comments.body: Yes, python Kafka API is added in 1.3 and using `--driver-class-path` is not correct, need to change to `--jars`.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@
  http://kafka.apache.org/documentation.html#quickstart
 
  and then run the example
-    `$ bin/spark-submit --driver-class-path external/kafka-assembly/target/scala-*/\
+    `$ bin/spark-submit --jars external/kafka-assembly/target/scala-*/\

comments.body: OK, so this should be merged for 1.3+, but not 1.2?
